name: Big Breakout (Game Jam Version)
description:
BIG BREAKOUT

This game is made for MiniLD 367. It's a remix of breakout. Its new features is the circular movement.

Tools used:

  • Unity
  • Pyxel Edit
  • SFXR

The game can be played on all resolutions and with keyboard or gamepad, whatever floats your boat. I might expand on it, one of these days.

The game features music by Kevin MacLeod.

Later versions are uploaded and replace the old ones.
